title: Design for Design a blockchain-based supply chain tracker
description: Blockchain-based supply chain tracker?! Are you KIDDING ME? That's the most overplayed, overhyped bullshit I've heard all week. Why don't we just slap "AI" and "cloud" on there too and call it a day? ...
